The people behind Theory are a band of aesthetic insiders who love luxury and simplicity. And, of course, Theory is all about the fit and the fabrics and feeling sexy and confident. Passion drives Theory to constantly evolve, and passionate is how people feel in its clothes and about its clothes. In Theory, anything is possible.
